alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Faulk; Potter; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 1:25AM MST until March 01 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Blowing snow early Wednesday morning expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Walworth, Dewey, Potter and Faulk Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ this morning to 9 AM CST /8 AM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
